QuestData.Title: The Stone Shards
QuestData.Description: I've scouted all over these highlands, $n, and there's one thing I've found I haven't been able to explain.$B$BTo the northeast of here, there's a circle of stones, like the others you'll find everywhere in Arathi... but the largest and most imposing of them, built into the mountainside itself.$B$BJust between you and me, I heard voices while I was there. Whispers of the earth. If you're the curious type, you could go see for yourself...
QuestData.RewardText: <The shards pulse softly, and a whisper slowly echoes through your head.>$B$BHelp...
